com.swopteam07.tablr.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swopteam07.tablr.CanvasWindow.CanvasWindow
      • com.swopteam07.tablr.controller.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends CanvasWindow
    Singleton Takes care of communication between the views and the database.

      • handleMouseEvent

        protected void handleMouseEvent(int id,
                                int x,
                                int y,
                                int clickCount)
        React to a user clicking somewhere in the application. Propagates clicks to the active view. If the click isn't contained within the active view select the new active view, except if the click event was a drag event, then clicks are propagated to currently the active view.
        Overrides:
        handleMouseEvent in class CanvasWindow
        Parameters:
        id - The type of mouse event.
        x - The x coordinate of the mouse click.
        y - The y coordinate of the mouse click.
        clickCount - The number of times that was clicked.

      • handleKeyEvent

        public void handleKeyEvent(int id,
                           int keyCode,
                           char keyChar)
        React to a user pressing a key.
        Overrides:
        handleKeyEvent in class CanvasWindow
        Parameters:
        id - The type of key event.
        keyCode - The number of key that was pressed.
        keyChar - The character that was typed.
        Effects:
      • If the escape key was pressed call the escape pressed function of the active view. | if (keyCode == 27 && getActiveView() != null)
            activeView.escapePressed()
      • If a the previous keypress was control and this keypress was t open a new tablesView. | if (keyCode == 84 && ctrlPressed) | tablesView()
      • If the active view isn't null, propagate the event to the active view. | if (getActiveView() != null) | getActiveView().handleKeyEvent(id, keyCode, keyChar)

      • paint

        protected void paint(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Draw all the view in the order that they were last active, with the active view on top.
        Overrides:
        paint in class CanvasWindow
        Parameters:
        g - This object offers the methods that allow you to paint on the canvas.
